item.title: BoneFire Tutorial Pi
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

Hi everyone today i will be showing you how to add the boneFire update which was added on rs here http://services.runescape.com/m=news/bonfires THis is just a bit of it like the options

Client Sided

Open: objectDef.java
and search for

right Under that Add this:

if (i == 2732) { objectDef.actions = new String[5]; objectDef.actions[0] = null; objectDef.actions[1] = "Add-Logs"; objectDef.name = "Fire"; objectDef.description = "An Log on fire".getBytes(); }

Server Sided

Open ActionHandler.java

and search for:

											[code]case 2732:
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1511,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1511, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1521,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1521, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1519,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1519, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1517,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1517, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1515,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1515, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
			else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1513,1)){
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1513, 1);
			c.startAnimation(883);
			c.stopMovement();
			c.sendMessage("You add a log to the fire.");
			}
			break;[/code]

I Might add on to this

Read full topic
